subject: Baseball
Memorial Day
lead_paragraph: Sandy Alderson, a former Marine infantry officer and the Mets’ first-year general manager, had a moment to reflect on how his father died last November after surviving 3 wars and 33 years as an Air Force pilot.
snippet: Sandy Alderson, a former Marine infantry officer and the Mets’ first-year general manager, had a moment to reflect on how his father died last November after surviving 3 wars and 33 years as an Air Force pilot.
